aries.strengths: Natural leadership, initiative, and courage to take on new challenges.
aries.weaknesses: Impatience, impulsiveness, and tendency to rush into decisions.

taurus.strengths: Determination, loyalty, and ability to create lasting foundations.
taurus.weaknesses: Stubbornness, resistance to change, and possessiveness.

gemini.strengths: Quick thinking, excellent communication, and adaptability.
gemini.weaknesses: Inconsistency, restlessness, and difficulty with commitment.

cancer.strengths: Deep empathy, strong intuition, and natural caregiving abilities.
cancer.weaknesses: Moodiness, oversensitivity, and tendency to retreat when hurt.

leo.strengths: Natural magnetism, generosity, and ability to inspire others.
leo.weaknesses: Pride, ego-centeredness, and need for constant attention.

virgo.strengths: Attention to detail, reliability, and desire to serve others.
virgo.weaknesses: Overcritical nature, worry, and tendency toward perfectionism.

libra.strengths: Natural sense of justice, charm, and ability to create harmony.
libra.weaknesses: Indecisiveness, people-pleasing, and avoidance of conflict.

scorpio.strengths: Deep emotional intelligence, loyalty, and transformative power.
scorpio.weaknesses: Jealousy, secretiveness, and tendency toward revenge.

sagittarius.strengths: Natural optimism, love of adventure, and philosophical wisdom.
sagittarius.weaknesses: Restlessness, tactlessness, and difficulty with routine.

capricorn.strengths: Strong work ethic, discipline, and ability to achieve long-term goals.
capricorn.weaknesses: Pessimism, rigidity, and tendency to be overly serious.

aquarius.strengths: Original thinking, humanitarian nature, and progressive ideals.
aquarius.weaknesses: Detachment, unpredictability, and resistance to emotional intimacy.

pisces.strengths: Deep compassion, artistic abilities, and spiritual sensitivity.
pisces.weaknesses: Escapism, over-emotionalism, and difficulty with boundaries.
